properties.name: Sunny Villa
properties.description: Spacious villa with a pool and garden, ideal for families.
properties.longDescription: This villa features a luxurious layout with five bedrooms, an expansive pool area, a lush garden, and modern interiors. It includes a state-of-the-art kitchen, multiple living areas, and stunning coastal views.

properties.name: Urban Flat
properties.description: Modern flat in the city center with all amenities.
properties.longDescription: Located in the heart of the city, this apartment boasts modern interiors, two spacious bedrooms, and convenient access to public transport, shopping, and dining options.

properties.name: Cosy Cottage
properties.description: Beautiful cottage surrounded by nature and tranquility.
properties.longDescription: This charming three-bedroom cottage offers a serene escape with its rustic charm, fireplace, and proximity to picturesque walking trails and nature reserves.

properties.name: Luxury Penthouse
properties.description: Elegant penthouse with panoramic city views.
properties.longDescription: Perched atop a skyline tower, this penthouse features luxurious finishes, expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, private terraces, and premium amenities.

properties.name: Family Bungalow
properties.description: Comfortable bungalow with a spacious backyard.
properties.longDescription: This charming bungalow features a spacious backyard, modern interiors, and is located in a family-friendly neighborhood close to schools and parks.

properties.name: Modern Studio
properties.description: Compact studio apartment perfect for singles or students.
properties.longDescription: This studio apartment offers a minimalist design with efficient use of space, ideal for individuals or students seeking convenience.

properties.name: Country Estate
properties.description: Exclusive estate with extensive grounds and modern amenities.
properties.longDescription: This expansive estate boasts manicured grounds, a main residence with luxurious amenities, guest houses, and recreational facilities.

properties.name: Suburban House
properties.description: Lovely house in a quiet suburb, perfect for families.
properties.longDescription: This suburban house offers a family-friendly layout, a spacious garden, and proximity to schools and local amenities.

properties.name: Seaside Villa
properties.description: Relaxing villa with stunning sea views.
properties.longDescription: This seaside villa features expansive balconies, direct beach access, and premium interiors for luxurious coastal living.

properties.name: City Apartment
properties.description: Stylish apartment in the city center with modern interiors.
properties.longDescription: This apartment features a sleek design, spacious rooms, and is situated close to public transport, shopping, and cultural attractions.

properties.name: Hillside Cabin
properties.description: Peaceful hillside retreat, perfect for nature lovers.
properties.longDescription: Nestled in the hills, this cabin provides a tranquil environment, rustic charm, and close proximity to nature trails.

properties.name: Urban Loft
properties.description: Modern loft in the city for young professionals.
properties.longDescription: This urban loft offers a stylish open layout, high ceilings, and is located in a vibrant neighborhood with cultural and dining options.

properties.name: Luxury Townhouse
properties.description: Elegant townhouse in a premium gated community.
properties.longDescription: This townhouse offers modern interiors, spacious rooms, a private garden, and access to community amenities such as a pool and gym.

properties.name: Historic Manor
properties.description: A majestic historic manor with sprawling grounds and antique interiors.
properties.longDescription: This manor exudes historic elegance with its original architecture, grand ballroom, extensive grounds, and antique furnishings.

properties.name: Eco-Friendly House
properties.description: Energy-efficient house with solar panels and a green roof.
properties.longDescription: This eco-friendly house incorporates solar energy systems, sustainable materials, and a modern design for environmentally conscious living.

properties.name: Luxury Beach House
properties.description: High-end beach house with private access to the shore and infinity pool.
properties.longDescription: This luxury beach house offers private beach access, an infinity pool, expansive decks, and a gourmet kitchen for upscale coastal living.

properties.name: Luxury Duplex
properties.description: Spacious duplex with premium interiors and amenities.
properties.longDescription: This duplex features a modern design, private balconies, and access to premium facilities, perfect for sophisticated living.

properties.name: Seaside Cabin
properties.description: Cozy cabin overlooking the sea, perfect for weekend getaways.
properties.longDescription: This cabin provides a serene setting with stunning sea views, a cozy interior, and convenient access to local attractions.

properties.name: Green Terrace Flat
properties.description: Contemporary flat with a terrace and eco-friendly design.
properties.longDescription: This flat combines modern living with sustainable features, including energy-efficient appliances and a private terrace.

properties.name: Lakeview Residence
properties.description: Beautiful residence overlooking a serene lake with modern interiors.
properties.longDescription: This property offers an exceptional living experience with its serene lake views, spacious interiors, and modern facilities. The house features four bedrooms, a well-equipped kitchen, a beautifully landscaped garden, and a garage. Perfect for families or individuals seeking tranquility combined with convenience.
